summary: Follows the passing of the FIFA baton through three association presidents: Jules Rimet, Joao Havelange, and Sepp Blatter.
cast: Sam Neill|Tim Roth|Fisher Stevens|Gérard Depardieu|Thomas Kretschmann|Richard Dillane|Jemima West|Nicholas Gleaves|Anthony Higgins|Martin Jarvis|Antonio de la Torre|Jason Barry|Steven Elder|Bruce Mackinnon|Benn Northover|Conor Mullen|Sean Campion|Miglen Mirtchev|Jerome Charvet|Marie Paquim|Dawn Bradfield|Roger Van Hool|Antony Byrne|Serge Hazanavicius|Nathan Rippy|Matt Beurois|Tom Cordier|Julian Miller|Héctor Cabello Reyes|Andrew French|Pippo Delbono|Robbie Nock|Natasha Mashkevich|Jean Kinsella|Nathan Willcocks|Benedict Freitag|Peter Hottinger|Sam Ourabah|Jean-Christophe Nigon|Anthony Vuignier|Ian McCamy|Fabienne Hadorn|Xavier Jozelon|Jules Abel Logel|Cheranich Stephan|Diomay Sarr|Sandeep Abraham|Lukas Ritzel|Daniel Ludwig|Maixence Bauduin|David Willer|Andy Haueter|Thomas Grascoeur|Jonathan Louis|Michèle Raingeval|Noël Sorrente|Arnaud Vallens
title: United Passions
